text:
Mia Brooks, I think
you're a really good dancer,
and no one will know anything

if you only dance in your house
for your little sister.

- ♪ Hey ♪ 
- You're a dope dancer.

- What's holding you back?
- ♪ Flex, flex ♪

You know there's only
one open spot, right?

- ♪ Yeah ♪ 
- Mia! You are grounded.

- You have school. That's it.
- You told your mom

about the dance team
and she kicked you out?

- ♪ Mmm ♪ 
- This team is the first step

in the dance number
that we like to call life.

- ♪ Hey ♪ 
- Ready?

- First up...
- Ready.
♪ Whoo, get it girl ♪

( squeals )
I post one video,

now 10,000 people
are following me?
♪ Turn it up ♪

I'm witnessing
the rebirth of a star!

- ♪ Hey, hey, hey, hey ♪ 
- I don't even know

who you are anymore,
or even where you are!

We don't need you
or those moves.

- Who is Mia?
- This is who I am.

- ♪ Hey, hey, hey, hey ♪ 
- You were...

- ♪ Hey, hey, hey ♪ 
- ...fire.
I literally woke up like this.
♪ Best get up out our way ♪

♪ 'Cause we stepping out
to slay ♪
